subject: Fix auto-scroll when loading older messages via pagination
body:
Modified polling logic in useMessages hook to update only affected messages instead of replacing entire message array. This prevents unwanted scroll-to-bottom behavior when users load older messages through infinite scroll.

Changes:
- Soft deletions: Filter out specific message IDs without recreating array
- New messages: Append and sort while preserving paginated messages
- Message updates: Map through existing array, updating only changed messages

This maintains scroll position stability during pagination while keeping realtime updates working correctly.
title: Fix auto-scroll when loading older messages via pagination
